wikipedia_page.main:
Richard A. Williams OBE FREng FTSE, FRSE is a British academic and engineer.  He is the Principal and Vice-Chancellor of Heriot-Watt University.  He took up this position on 1 September 2015. He is a chemical engineer. 
He was Vice President and a Trustee of the Royal Academy of Engineering.

link_mentions.page: List of chancellors and vice-chancellors of British universities

Industrial Tomography Systems began as an incubator company in 1997, responsible for commercializing technologies developed by University of Manchester Institute of Science and Technology.Kate Bassett, "Ken Primrose", Real Business, 1 July 2011 Founders included a number of academics who had helped to develop tomography technology, such as Professors Brian HoyleInstitute of Particle Science & Engineering, "Brian Hoyle", University of Leeds and Mi WangSchool of Process, Environmental and Materials Engineering, "Professor Mi Wang", University of Leeds (of University of Leeds) and Professor Richard Williams (then of Camborne School of Mines);Institute of Particle Science & Engineering, "Professor Richard A Williams", University of Leeds as well as Ken Primrose, who continues to function as CEO as of late-2016.Manchester Evening News, "Secret of my success - 'Have inspired ideas... and employ the best'", Manchester Evening News, 16 September 2011
